org.adl.samplerte.client
Class ServletProxy

java.lang.Object
  org.adl.samplerte.client.ServletProxy
public class ServletProxy
extends java.lang.Object

Filename: ServletProxy

Description:
This class encapsulates communication between the API Adapter applet and the LMSCMIServlet.

Design Issues:
This implementation is intended to be used by the SCORM 2004 3rd Edition Sample RTE.

Implementation Issues:

Known Problems:

Side Effects:

References:

  • SCORM 2004 3rd Edition

Method Summary
 LMSCMIServletResponse postLMSRequest(LMSCMIServletRequest iRequest)
          Reads from the LMS server via the LMSCMIServlet; the SCODataManager object containing all of the run-time data model elements relevant for the current user (student) and current SCO.

Constructor

Method Detail

postLMSRequest

public LMSCMIServletResponse postLMSRequest(LMSCMIServletRequest iRequest)
Reads from the LMS server via the LMSCMIServlet; the SCODataManager object containing all of the run-time data model elements relevant for the current user (student) and current SCO.

Parameters:
iRequest - A LMSCMIServletRequest object that provides all the data neccessary to POST a call to the LMSCMIServlet.
Returns:
The LMSCMIServletResponse object provided by the LMSCMIServlet.

postLMSRequest

public SSP_ServletResponse postLMSRequest(SSP_ServletRequest iRequest)
Reads from the LMS server via the SSP_Servlet; the response containing the information requested.

Parameters:
iRequest - A SSP_ServletRequest object that provides all the data neccessary to POST a call to the SSP_Servlet.
Returns:
The LMSCMIServletResponse object provided by the LMSCMIServlet.
